title: CryptoDrakeNFT
author: CryptoDrakeNFT
content: CryptoDrake has descended upon the realm!A vision... again? A faint voice... A strange creature. A dragon? But dragons do not exist. Or do they? It looked so real! It was that weird dream as before... CryptoDrake!?Hello everyone!Check out my CryptoDrake trading-themed collection. The limited handmade collection is dedicated to traders and will be auctioned on Saturday 17th of September. I would like my collection to be traded amongst crypto traders/enthusiasts. Go to my opensea collection and click on the heart of your favorite cryptocurrency!Also, you can follow my twitter for updates and the upcoming collections!https://opensea.io/CryptoDrakeStudiohttps://twitter.com/CrptDrkNFT
